import_customer_descr: Upload a CSV file to import customers. CSV columns: name (required), email (optional, auto-generated if not provided), phoneNumber (optional, must be unique if provided), creditPoint (defaults to 0, creates ledger entry if value provided), creditFiat (defaults to 0, creates ledger entry if value provided). All imported customers will have 'customer' role. Users are matched by email or phoneNumber if provided. If found, user is updated; if not found, new user is created with auto-generated email.
in_person_credit_refill_note_ledger: Cash payment: {{cashAmount}} {{currency}}. Credit given: {{amount}} + bonus {{bonus}} = {{totalCredit}} points. Operator: {{operator}}.
in_person_credit_refill_note_with_extra: Cash payment: {{cashAmount}} {{currency}}. Credit given: {{amount}} + bonus {{bonus}} = {{totalCredit}} points. Operator: {{operator}}. {{note}}

invalid_drop_target: Invalid drop target. Please try again.

pricing_rule_cost_descr: Leave empty to use the default cost in store settings.

qr_code_facility_ordering_URL_descr: This is the ordering URL for this facility. Typically when customers are ready, they can scan this QR code to order through this URL.
qr_code_ordering_URL_descr: This is the ordering URL of the store. Customers can order through this URL.
qr_code_page_description: You can download and print the following QR Codes. If you want to design your own QR Code, please use the given URL.
qr_code_reservation_URL_descr: This is the reservation URL of the store. Customers can make reservations through this URL.

rsvp_admin_create_reservation_descriptio: Please fill in the form below to create a reservation for the customer.
rsvp_already_no_show: Reservation is already marked as No Show
rsvp_can_not_be_cancelled: ⚠️ This reservation is within the cannot cancel window. No refund will be provided if cancelled.
rsvp_can_only_complete_ready: Only RSVPs in Ready status can be completed
rsvp_can_only_no_show_ready: Only RSVPs in Ready status can be marked as No Show
rsvp_can_Reserve_After_descr: From now, maximum hours in the future that reservations can be made. e.g. 1 year = 8760 hours; 1 month = 730 hours. Default: 3 months (2190 hours).
rsvp_can_Reserve_Before_descr: From now, how many hours in advanced later can reservations be made. e.g. If current time is 7PM and this is set to 2, only reservations at 9PM or later are allowed.
rsvp_can_Select_Service_Staff_descr: Customers must select a service staff to complete the reservation.
rsvp_cancel_Hours_descr: e.g. 24 hours before the reservation time can cancel for free.
rsvp_cancel_reservation_confirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation? This action cannot be undone.
rsvp_cancellation_policy: If you cannot come at the reserved time, please cancel at least {{hours}} hours before the reservation.
rsvp_cannot_cancel_reservation: This store does not allow reservations to be cancelled.
rsvp_delete_reservation_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this reservation?
rsvp_edit_descr: Create new reservation or edit existing reservation.
rsvp_facility_optional_description: Optional: Select a facility for this reservation
rsvp_failed_convert_rsvp_time_epoch: Failed to convert rsvpTime to epoch
rsvp_failed_convert_rsvp_time_utc: Failed to convert rsvpTime to UTC
rsvp_history_descr: Click the "Date Range" and "Reservation Status" buttons to filter reservation records.
rsvp_Hours_descr: Use the settings here to determine the available reservation hours (instead of using store's business hours).
rsvp_import_auto_schedule_description: When enabled, empty lines will be automatically scheduled as recurring reservations based on previous time slots. When disabled, empty lines will be skipped.
rsvp_import_block_topup_note: RSVP import block top-up: {{amount}} {{currency}} for {{count}} reservation(s)
rsvp_import_data_description: Please paste the RSVP data in the format. First line: Customer Name, Product Name, Payment Date. Second line and beyond: Reservation date and time range.
rsvp_import_service_staff_description: Select the service staff member for all imported reservations. You can change individual reservations in the edit dialog.
rsvp_Must_Select_Facility_descr: Customers must select a facility to complete the reservation.
rsvp_name_and_phone_required_for_anonymo: Name and phone are required for anonymous reservations
rsvp_name_required_for_anonymous: Name is required for anonymous reservations
rsvp_no_facilities_available_at_selected: No facilities available at selected time
rsvp_No_Need_To_Confirm: No Need To Confirm When Fully Paid
rsvp_No_Need_To_Confirm_descr: If the reservation is paid, no need to confirm the reservation.
rsvp_no_permission_to_cancel: You do not have permission to cancel this reservation
rsvp_no_permission_to_delete: You do not have permission to delete this reservation
rsvp_no_permission_to_edit: You do not have permission to edit this reservation
rsvp_not_allowed_to_create: You are not allowed to create reservations
rsvp_only_pending_can_delete: Only pending reservations can be deleted. Please cancel instead.
rsvp_order_total_must_be_greater_than_ze: Order total must be greater than 0
rsvp_paid_reservation_cannot_delete: Paid reservations cannot be deleted. Please cancel instead.
rsvp_payment_method_not_found: Payment method with identifier "{{payUrl}}" not found
rsvp_phone_required_for_anonymous: Phone number is required for anonymous reservations
rsvp_please_sign_in: Please sign in to make a reservation
rsvp_Prepaid_Amount: Default amount of money or points to be prepaid.
rsvp_Prepaid_Amount_descr: Customer need to prepay the amount of money or points to make a reservation.
rsvp_prepaid_payment_note: RSVP prepaid. Customer points used: {{points}}. Cash value: {{cashValue}} {{currency}}.
rsvp_Prepaid_Percentage_descr: Prepaid percentage: default is 0, meaning prepaid is not required. 100 means need to paid in full.
rsvp_prepaid_required: This reservation will deduct your prepaid points: {{points}} points.
rsvp_Prepaid_Required_descr: Customer must have a balance to reserve / booking requires a deposit.
rsvp_Require_Signature_descr: Customer must confirm and sign off. RSVP will consider in-completed if not signed off.
rsvp_reservation_can_only_be_modified_ho: Reservation can only be modified more than {{hours}} hours before the reservation time
rsvp_reservation_not_belong_to_store: Reservation does not belong to the specified store
rsvp_reservations_can_only_be_made_hours: Reservations can only be made up to {{hours}} hours (approximately {{months}} months) in advance. The selected time is too far in the future.
rsvp_reservations_must_be_made_hours_in_: Reservations must be made at least {{hours}} hours in advance. The selected time is too soon.
rsvp_Show_Cost_descr: Whether to display the amount deducted or points on the reservation page.
rsvp_Single_Service_Mode_descr: For personal shops: only ONE reservation per time slot across all facilities. When enabled, blocks any reservation if another reservation exists for the same time slot, regardless of facility. When disabled (default), multiple reservations can exist on the same time slot as long as they use different facilities.
rsvp_time_outside_business_hours_facilit: The selected time is outside business hours for this facility
rsvp_time_outside_business_hours_service: The selected time is outside business hours for this service staff
rsvp_time_outside_window: This time slot is outside the allowed reservation window
rsvp_time_slot_already_booked_facility: This time slot is already booked for this facility. Please select a different time.
rsvp_time_slot_already_booked_single_ser: This time slot is already booked. Only one reservation is allowed per time slot in single service mode.
rsvp_to_be_credited: To be Credited to Fiat Balance
rsvp_to_be_deducted: To be Deducted from Fiat Balance
rsvp_Use_Business_Hours_descr: Turn on to use store's business hours. Or specify the available hours here.
rsvp-period-select-start-and-end-dates: Select start and end dates for the period
select_channels_descr: Select which channels to use for delivery (only enabled channels shown)
send_notification_descr: Send notifications to customers or staff
service_staff_add_descr: Add a new service staff member
service_staff_id_copied: Service staff ID copied to clipboard.
set_password_description: Click the button below to receive an email to set up a password for your account.
sign_up_description: Enter your information to create an account
signin_cannot_receive_email: If you no longer able to access the mail box, please contact customer service.
signin_description: Sign in with your email and password.
signin_or_signup: Please use the following methods to sign in or sign up.
store_admin_switch_level_cancel_confirm: You are changing to Free version. Are you sure?
store_admin_switch_level_cancel_result: You are back to Free version. You can use paid features til: {0}.
store_admin_switch_level_page_descr: pick a version that best fits your needs.
store_admin_switch_level_title: The selected subscription plan will incur charges monthly.
store_closed: Store is closed, unable to accept orders
store_notification_preferences_descr: Set default notification preferences for new customers. Customers can override these preferences in their account settings.
store_reservation_descr: Please click + to make a reservation. It's {{required}} to prepay money or credits to complete the reservation. Free cancel is available at least {{hours}} hours ahead of the reservation time.
store_settings_accept_anonymous_order_de: customer does not need to log in to place an order.
store_settings_auto_accept_order_descr: No need to confirm orders when the setting is on.
store_settings_credit_max_purchase_descr: e.g. Can only purchase 100 points at most. 0 means unlimited.
store_settings_credit_min_purchase_descr: e.g. At least purchase 10 points. 0 means unlimited.
store_settings_is_open_descr: Indicates whether the store is open or closed regardless of the business hours setting.
store_settings_payout_schedule_descr: We will wire your revenue according to the settings.
store_settings_require_prepay_descr: If on, non-paid orders is hidden to the staff.
store_settings_store_description_descr: A concise and compelling store introduction that will be displayed prominently on the homepage, allowing customers to immediately understand your store's unique value. For example: "Crafting every cup with care, bringing you the warmest moments" or "Fresh ingredients and professional service, creating unforgettable dining experiences".
store_settings_use_business_hours_descr: If turn off, will use [Is opened] parameter.
store_settings_use_customer_credit_descr: Turn on to enable customer credit/ points system.
store_settings_use_order_system_descr: Enable the order system for this store.
store_specific_preferences_description: Override global preferences for this store
store_template_note: This template will be store-specific (not global)
